function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid diagnosis and risk prediction of COVID-19 through AI and machine learning algorithms","Impact":"Misdiagnosis, resource allocation issues, increased exposure to SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Clinical validation, rigorous testing, continuous improvement of algorithms","Technologies":"AI, machine learning, virtual care platforms","People":"Infected patients, healthcare professionals, healthcare institutions","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology developers"},{"Description":"Use of cloud-based AI-assisted CT service for detecting COVID-19 pneumonia","Impact":"Misdiagnosis, delayed treatment, resource allocation issues","Mitigation":"Quality control, clinical validation, continuous improvement of AI algorithms","Technologies":"Cloud-based AI, CT imaging","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology developers"},{"Description":"Global availability of open-source deep convolutional neural network design for detecting COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Misdiagnosis, resource allocation issues, increased exposure to SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Training and education for clinicians, quality control of predictions, continuous improvement of AI algorithms","Technologies":"Deep learning, COVID-Net, chest x-rays","People":"Clinicians, healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology developers"}]}
